item.title: Conductors
item.description: I don’t know much about orchestra and conducting, however I sang in a boy’s choir when I was a child and since then I have admiration for orchestras and I like classical music. This is Georges Prêtre conducting the Vienna New Year’s Concert in 2010. I like how he is enjoying the music and sometimes is not conducting at all but only listening. Then, watch the end, Prêtre being 85 years old, he can still explode!
